DOC.brief_summary: This is a 10 year follow-up investigation of patients who have underwent total hip arthroplasty with a cemented Bimetric stem.
DOC.brief_title: Bimetric-10: Investigation of Patients Who Have Underwent Total Hip Arthroplasty With a Cemented Bi-Metric Stem
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Osteoarthrosis Exclusion criteria: Malignancies
